description: Another guy who was too cool to put on some formal clothes for an job interview. I let it slide because it was a very hot today. I kind of envied him and couldn´t wait to get off my shirt. The boy came to Prague to work as a hair cutter. He had some experience and most of all, he made me quite horny. There was nothing to think about, the job was his. And not just any job. 35 000 a month is a huge salary. The guy was absolutely thrilled. He merely had to do a few naughty things to please me. He agreed quite fast and was eager to make some extra money for various nasty tasks. He tried very hard to suck me the right way. Being straight, he had some difficulties. Ramming his tiny hairy asshole was easier, he just had to stay still and suck the pain up.
title: Dirty Scout 89
